meanings.sent1: Their monogamic relationship was based on trust and loyalty.
meanings.sent2: Monogamic couples are committed to each other for life.
meanings.sent3: The monogamic penguins decided to build a nest together.
meanings.sent4: She viewed their monogamic bond as unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The concept of monogamic love is beautiful and rare.

meanings.sent1: They made a monogamic agreement to only be with each other.
meanings.sent2: Monogamic individuals choose to be faithful to one partner.
meanings.sent3: The monogamic birds sang love songs to each other.
meanings.sent5: The monogamic lifestyle requires commitment and devotion.
